text: Ami ta'orata abartirna karechi. Ete hedayata o alo rayeche. Allahara ajnabaha payagambara, darabesa o alemara era madhyame ihudiderake phayasala ditena. Kenana, taderake e khodayi granthera dekhasona karara nirdesa deya hayechila ebam tamra era raksanabeksane niyukta chilena. Ata'eba, tomara manusake bhaya karo na ebam amake bhaya kara ebam amara ayata samuhera binimaye sbalpamulye grahana karo na, yesaba loka allaha ya abatirna karechena, tadanuyayi phayasala kare na, tara'i kaphera.
